clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial Investigating the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of NNC0148-0000-0287 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Trial Investigating the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of NNC0148-0000-0287 in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This trial is conducted in Europe. The aim of this first human dose trial is to investigate the safety, tolerability, pharmacodynamic (the effect of the investigated drug on the body) and pharmacokinetic (exposure of the trial drug in the body) properties of NNC0148-0000-0287 (insulin 287) in a GIPETÂ® I tablet formulation in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.time_frame: As recorded from trial product administration and until completion of Sub-visit 2G (Day 13)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the serum insulin concentration-time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 to 648 hours after a single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the glucose infusion rate (GIR)-time curve
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From 0 to 24 hours after a single dose

arm_group.description: Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.
Each subject will be randomly assigned to receive either insulin 287, placebo or insulin glargine within the dose group.

intervention.description: Orally administered insulin 287. The subjects will be dosed in the fasting state and receive one single dose followed by a 24-hour euglycaemic glucose clamp.
Insulin glargine administered subcutaneously (s.c., under the skin) at fixed dose levels.
Oral placebo adminstered corresponding to insulin 287 treatment

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Body mass index 18.0-28.0 kg/m^2
- Subject who is considered to be healthy based on the medical history, physical examination, and the results of vital signs, electrocardiogram (ECG) and clinical laboratory tests performed during the screening visit, as judged by the investigator
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known or suspected hypersensitivity to trial products or related products
- Previous participation in this trial. Participation is defined as randomised
- Presence of clinically significant acute gastrointestinal symptoms (e.g. nausea, vomiting, heartburn or diarrhoea) within 2 weeks prior to dosing, as judged by the investigator
- Any chronic disorder or severe disease which, in the opinion of the investigator, might jeopardise subject's safety or compliance with the protocol
